column4: how/where can i change the buffer size of the terminal window in ubuntu 5.10 ?
edit current profile and go to scrolling.
there is a thing called devilspie that helps you fix things like that. Some X programs also support the -geometry option.
I use 'alias xpdf='xpdf -z width -geometry 1024x900+10+10'' so it opens the way I like it.
